Package xbot.common.subsystems.vision

package xbot.common.subsystems.vision
  • Class
    Description
    AprilTagCamera
    This class provides common base implementation for April Tag capable cameras on the robot.
    AprilTagVisionIO
    IO interface for AprilTag vision inputs.
    AprilTagVisionIO.PoseObservation
    Represents a robot pose sample used for pose estimation.
    AprilTagVisionIO.PoseObservationType
     
    AprilTagVisionIO.TargetObservation
    Represents the angle to a simple target, not used for pose estimation.
    AprilTagVisionIO.VisionIOInputs
     
    AprilTagVisionIOFactory
     
    AprilTagVisionIOPhotonVision
    IO implementation for real PhotonVision hardware.
    AprilTagVisionIOPhotonVision.FactoryImpl
     
    AprilTagVisionIOPhotonVisionSimulated
    IO implementation for a simulated PhotonVision environment.
    AprilTagVisionIOPhotonVisionSimulated.FactoryImpl
     
    AprilTagVisionSubsystem
    Subsystem for processing AprilTag vision data.
    CameraCapabilities
    This enum is used to specify the capabilities of a camera.

    MockAprilTagVisionIO.FactoryImpl

    This class provides common base implementation for cameras on the robot.
